name: Bouncesketball
description:
Bouncesketball is a basketball-themed 2D platformer in which you are tasked with guiding a basketball to a hoop. This is my first complete Unity project and I do plan on adding a little bit of refinement to it as time goes on, but I hope this gives you a bit of fun for a few minutes and I would love to hear any helpful feedback you can provide. I would love to hear ideas for improvements for this current project/ideas for a new game.

The game's controls are as follows:

1. The arrow keys and spacebar move the player character 

2. The "R" key restarts the current level

3. Press Escape to halt the application and Alt+F4 to shut down the application.

I think this would be a pretty cool game to try speedrunning for the first time as it (currently) has 14 levels with no loading screens, no menus, and a host of levels that can be easily beaten far quicker than I originally intended through creative use of the game's mechanics.

Thanks for playing!
